response.message:
Hi. Please wait for someone to help you with your problem.
Understand that this channel is only meant to help you.
If you encounter a bug, please report it on the respective GitHub repository instead.

Thank you!

embed.title: Where or how to get ReVanced ‚ùì
embed.description: You have asked a question that has been answered in the <#953993848374325269> channel already. Make sure to read it as it will answer a lot of your questions guaranteed.

fields.name: üî∏ Regarding your question
fields.value: You can download prebuild packages to build ReVanced. For now, please follow the documentation in <#953993848374325269> `III`.

embed.title: Do you have a problem or need help ‚ùì
embed.description: You have asked a question that has been answered in the <#953993848374325269> channel already. Make sure to read it as it will answer a lot of your questions guaranteed.

fields.name: üî∏ Regarding your question
fields.value: Please make sure to read the second half of <#953993848374325269> `XV`, if you have enough knowledge and ask your question in <#985666124068814888>, otherwise the first half applies.

embed.title: When will ReVanced release ‚ùì
embed.description: You have asked a question that has been answered in the <#953993848374325269> channel already. Make sure to read it as it will answer a lot of your questions guaranteed.

fields.name: üî∏ Regarding your question
fields.value: ReVanced has already been released and is under active development. Please check <#953993848374325269> `XII`.

embed.title: Official ReVanced social media
embed.description: You may have encountered a fake channel, please check out the official ReVanced social media links which are located in <#954066838856273960> channel.
